New.Headline: Customizable icon styling
New.Body: Customise the positioning, scale and more inside the AssetIconAttribute parameters.

New.Headline: Support for multiple graphics
New.Body: Added support for multiple graphics being rendered for a single asset.

New.Headline: Support for rendering prefabs
New.Body: Added support for rendering GameObject's to use as a ScriptableObject icon.

New.Headline: Preferences menu
New.Body: Added a tab to Unity's Preferences Window for customising AssetIcons.

Changed.Headline: AssetIconAttribute removed from the Global Namespace
Changed.Body: Moved AssetIconAttribute from the Global Namespace to "AssetIcons".

Changed.Headline: Cleaned up AssetIconDrawer APIs
Changed.Body: Unified APIs for interfacing with AssetIcons' drawing tools.

Changed.Headline: Updated Documentation Format
Changed.Body: Removed the PDF documentation in favour of interactive HTML documentation.

Removed.Headline: Modules System
Removed.Body: Removed the old "Modules" system in favour of the preferences menu.

Fixes.Headline: Made icons draw in "One-Column" mode
Fixes.Body: Fixed issue where icons weren't being drawn when in "One-Column" mode.

Fixes.Headline: Add support for Unity-drawn flairs
Fixes.Body: Added support for Unity Collab (and other) flairs.

Fixes.Headline: ReflectionTypeLoadException after code recompilation
Fixes.Body: This exception was being thrown after code recompilation only on certain environments.
